question: ICC International World Cup has completed 11 successful editions of the tournament. How many teams in all have competed in the same?
explanation: ICC Cricket World Cup takes place every four years with the teams enjoying the highest ranks getting automatic qualification. The rest are selected by WCL and ICC World Cup Qualifier. A total of 20 teams have competed in the 11 editions of the tournament. 14 teams competed in the last edition of 2015.
